questions: Do you plan to host gatherings or parties during your stay?
Are you comfortable following house rules during your stay?
Do you require complete silence during the night?
Are you okay with a no-shoes policy inside the apartment?
Will you be traveling with children under the age of 5?
Do you typically leave accommodations clean and tidy at checkout?
Are you willing to report any damages immediately during your stay?
Do you require 24/7 assistance during your stay?
